name: Animal Skin
description: Your skin has mutated noticeably because it is more related to animals than humans. It grows more hair than a human skin and its a bit tougher, and doesn't seem to  protect you from cold... Beasty! But you are doing just fine. Also you won't have any problem related to skin.

name: Avian Skin
description: Your skin has mutated noticeably because it is more related to birds than humans. At the beggining it looks normal but if you look closely, it looks like if you are having a classic 'chicken skin' symptom just that is a little more scaly, a bit pinkier, and it is a bit more delicate... Birdie! But you are doing just fine. Also you won't have any problem related to skin.

name: Snake Skin
description: Your skin has mutated noticeably because it is more related to reptiles than humans. It has a very scaly texture, its a bit shiny, a bit more hardy, and a little slippery. Or similar to that of snakes for short... Snakey! But you are doing just fine. Also you won't have any problem related to skin.

name: Chitinous Skin
description: Your epidermis has turned into a thin, flexible layer of chitin.  It provides minor protection from cutting wounds.  Slightly reduces wet effects.

name: Chitinous Armor
description: You've grown a chitin exoskeleton, much like that of an insect.  It provides considerable physical protection, but reduces your dexterity by 1.  Somewhat reduces wet effects.

name: Chitinous Plate
description: You've grown a chitin exoskeleton made of thick, stiff plates.  It provides excellent physical protection, but reduces your dexterity by 1 and encumbers all body parts but your eyes and mouth.  Greatly reduces wet effects.

name: Hairy Chitin
description: You've developed some sort of hair growing out of your chitin.  It's a bit warmer than not having hair.

name: Furred Chitin
description: Your chitin hair has thickened and spread across your body.  It provides minor warmth and helps you sense nearby vibrations.

name: Furred Plate
description: Your exoskeleton has hardened considerably--restricting movement, granted--and boasts a fine coat of hairs that put feline whiskers to shame.

name: Insect Limbs
description: You've *finally* sprouted a pair of arms from your midsection.  They flail more-or-less uncontrollably,  making you feel rather larval.

name: Vomitous
description: You have a major digestive disorder.  Though it causes you to vomit frequently, you have found that you can trigger your vomit reflex on demand, too.

name: High Thirst
description: Your body dries out easily; you need to drink more water.

name: Stubby Tail
description: You have a short, stubby tail, like a rabbit's.  It serves no purpose.

name: Tortoise Tail
description: You grown a short, thin tail. It looks cute and quite tortoisey, but it otherwise serves no purpose.

name: Cold Blooded
description: You are cold-blooded and rely on heat to keep moving.  Your lose 1% of your speed for every 2 (1.1) degrees below 65 F (18.3 C).

name: Ectothermic
description: Your body has become permanently cold-blooded.  Your speed lowers--or raises--for every 2 (1.1) degrees below or above 65 F (18.3 C).

name: Web Spinner
description: You have grown a spider abdomen that produces and anchors webbing.  Too bad you can't seem to control the process.  There is a chance that you will leave webs in your wake. Prevents wearing non-fabric pants

name: Web Weaver
description: You've developed the necessary anatomy and techniques to control your web-generation.  Activate this to start or stop weaving webs.

name: Web Diver
description: Your webbing is easily strong enough to support your weight.  You'll use it to descend down any sheer drops you may encounter.

name: Rope Webs
description: With spinnerets like THESE, who needs rope?!  Activate to produce rope.

name: Large Talons
description: Your fingers have grown into huge talons. After a bit of practice, you find that this does not affect your dexterity, but allows for a deadly unarmed attack.  They also prevent you from wearing gloves.

name: Bird Wings
description: You have a pair of large, feathered wings.  Your body is too heavy to be able to fly, but you can use them to slow your descent during a fall, and will not take falling damage under any circumstances.

name: Beak
description: Your mouth and nose have formed into a beak.  You can occasionally use it to peck at your enemies, but it is impossible for you to wear mouth gear.  Slightly reduces wet effects.

name: Mouth Flaps
description: Skin tabs and odd flaps of skin surround your mouth.  They don't affect your eating, but are unpleasant to look at.

name: Tough Feet
description: The bottoms of your feet are tough and you are accustomed to going barefoot.  You receive no movement penalty for not wearing shoes.

name: Feathers
description: Iridescent feathers have grown to cover your entire body, providing a marginal protection against attacks and minor protection from cold.  They also provide a natural waterproofing.

name: Down
description: You don't need to migrate south with your layer of down.  It's even better with no apes around to kill you for it!

name: Avian Physique
description: Your physiology now has more in common with birds than it does humans. The scales on your arms and legs provide some protection and the talons on your feet leave a nasty scratch, but your changed feet prevents you from wearing footgear. +2 dex

attacks.attack_text_u: You scratch and slash at %s with the claws on your feet
attacks.attack_text_npc: %1$s scratches and slashes at %2$s with the claws on their feet

name: Ursine Anatomy
description: Your body structure and physiology has taken on a rather ursine quality. You feel a little stronger, but you look rather inhuman because of it.

name: Bovine Anatomy
description: Your body structure and physiology has taken on a rather bovine quality. You feel a little stronger, but you look rather inhuman because of it.

name: Tortoise Anatomy
description: Your body structure and physiology has taken on a rather tortoisey quality. You feel a little stronger and safer, but you look rather inhuman because of it.

name: Raptor Anatomy
description: Your body structure and physiology has become similar to that of a velociraptor. You feel a little stronger and faster, but you look rather inhuman because of it.

name: Flora
description: The structure of your body and your internal physiology has more in common with flora than it does fauna. Why bother with things like 'scavenging' and 'hunting' when there is good soil to plant yourself in?.

name: Chimerical Anatomy
description: Your body structure and physiology has become an amalgamation of multiple different animals. You feel unstoppable, but you now no longer even look vaguely human. Any potential meal looking at you would have no doubt that you are some sort of chimerical monster.

name: Beastly Anatomy
description: Your body structure and physiology has become that of some super predatory beast. You have never felt better, but there would be little doubt in anyone's mind that you are anything but human.

name: Lupine Anatomy
description: Your body structure and physiology has more in common with canines than it does humans. You feel like a fearless predator, but you bet people would mistake you for a werewolf.

name: Feline Anatomy
description: Your body structure and physiology has more in common with felines than it does humans. You feel as nimble as a cat, but no one would mistake you for human anymore.

name: Fish Anatomy
description: Your body structure and physiology has become similar to that of some aquatic animal. You feel faster than before, but you look very inhuman because of it. All you want to do is get back into the water.

name: Reptilian Anatomy
description: Your body structure and physiology has more in common with crocodilians than of humans. Your muscles bulge with power, but no one would mistake you for human. Maybe you should find a nice sunny spot to bask in.

name: Rodentine Anatomy
description: You don't have time for lollygagging when there's survival at stake. Who cares that you're not even human anymore when the other survivors out there can't even compete with you?

name: Arachnid Anatomy
description: Your body structure and physiology has more in common with arachnids than of humans. Your arachnid abdomen now safely houses your vital organs. You wonder what will wander into your web today.

name: Insectile Anatomy
description: Your body structure and physiology has more in common with insects than of humans. Your insectile abdomen now safely houses your vital organs, but you doubt that you will be making any human friends soon.

name: Flowering
description: You've started blooming where your scalp used to be.  Your blossoms have a pleasant aroma, are visually striking, and are quite sensitive.

name: Strongly Venomous
description: Your venom has become particularly strong.  You're confident that your natural attacks will take your target down quickly.

name: Blossomed
description: Your entire head has become a flower with a deadly stinger in its center much like like those triffids that you saw earlier. You can still eat, breathe, and see just fine, but you cannot wear anything on or around your head.

attacks.attack_text_u: You stab at %s with the stinger inside your petals
attacks.attack_text_npc: %1$s stabs at %2$s with the stinger inside their petals

name: Phelloderm
description: Your skin is light green and has a slightly woody quality to it.  This provides a weak armor, and helps you retain moisture, resulting in less thirst.  Greatly decreases wet penalties.

name: Bark
description: Your skin is coated in a lightly colored bark, like that of a tree.  This provides resistance to bashing and cutting damage and minor protection from fire.  Greatly reduces wet effects.

name: Mossy
description: A deep green moss has grown a patchy covering over parts of your body providing some protection from the cold.

name: Regeneration
description: Your flesh regenerates from wounds incredibly quickly.

name: Chloromorphosis
description: Every inch of your skin is packed with chlorophyll and you have strong roots.  Sleeping on diggable soil will satisfy any hunger or thirst you might have.

name: Quills
description: Your body is covered with large quills.  Whenever an unarmed opponent strikes a part of your body that is not covered by clothing, they will receive significant damage.

name: Claws
description: You have claws on the ends of your fingers.  If you aren't wearing gloves, your unarmed attacks deal a minor amount of cutting damage.

name: Toe Talons
description: You have grown large, curved, and wickedly sharp talons in place of your big toes.  Fortunately, they don't get in the way of your movement.  Unfortunately, they do prevent you from wearing footgear.

name: Hooves
description: Your feet have fused into hooves.  This allows kicking attacks to do much more damage, provides natural armor, and removes the need to wear shoes; however, you can not wear shoes of any kind.  Reduces wet effects.

name: Chimerical Legs
description: Your legs have mutated in such a manner that your body managed to develop fearsome but impressive and very powerful and sharp hoof-claws, something that was never seen before in the animal kingdom. They allow you to make some powerful kicking attacks, but they prevent you from wearing any footgear

attacks.attack_text_u: You kick at %s with your hoof
You slash at %s with your claw

name: Padded Feet
description: The bottoms of your feet are strongly padded.  You receive no movement penalty for not wearing shoes, and even receive a 10% bonus when moving barefoot.

name: Bear Feet
description: Your feet have taken on a distinctly ursine quality to them.  This has no effect.

name: Forked Tongue
description: Your tongue is forked, like that of a reptile.  This has no effect.

name: Bovine Tongue
description: Your tongue has flattened and has become wider, looking like that of a bovine.  This has no effect.

name: Ursine Tongue
description: Your tongue has flattened and has become longer, looking like that of a bear.  This has no effect.

name: Tortoise Tongue
description: Your tongue has become rounded and thicker, looking like that of a tortoise.  This has no effect.

name: Slow Healer
description: You heal a little slower than most; sleeping will heal less lost HP.

name: Chemical Imbalance
description: You suffer from a minor chemical imbalance, whether mental or physical.  Minor changes to your internal chemistry will manifest themselves on occasion, such as hunger, sleepiness, narcotic effects, etc.

name: Rough Skin
description: Your skin is slightly rough.  This has no gameplay effect.

name: Scales
description: A set of flexible green scales has grown to cover your body, acting as natural armor.  Somewhat reduces wet effects.

name: Raptor Scales
description: A set of flexible iridescent scales has grown to cover your body, acting as natural armor.  Somewhat reduces wet effects.

name: Raptor Feathers
description: A set of beautiful colored shiny feathers has grown to cover some parts of your body, acting as natural armor. And making your appereance more majestic than before, with a collar of feathers around your neck, that looks like a crown-like set of feathers you sure, have become a presence to behold. Somewhat reduces wet effects and protects slightly agaisnt cold.

name: Lightly Furred
description: Light fur has grown to cover your entire body, providing slight protection from cold.

name: Furry
description: Thick black fur has grown to cover your entire body, providing a marginal protection against attacks, and considerable protection from cold.

name: Shaggy Fur
description: Your fur has grown out and thickened, providing noticeable protection from attacks as well as considerable insulation.

name: Rough Fur
description: the on your body fur has taken on a rough texture. It provides marginal protection against attacks, and considerable protection from cold.

name: Gray Fur
description: Dense gray fur has grown to cover your entire body, providing a marginal protection against attacks, and considerable protection from cold.

name: Sleek Fur
description: You've grown sleek brown fur, providing some protection from cold.

name: Thick Fur
description: You've grown a thick pelt of rough black fur, providing protection from cold and attacks.

name: Lynx Fur
description: Your fur's grown out significantly around your cheeks and neck.  It provides minor protection against attacks.

name: Aquatic Adaptation
description: Your body's physiology has completely adapted to life underwater. This doesn't change your appearance much, but you seem to always have a fishy sheen to your body.  Greatly increases wet benefits.

name: Sleek Scales
description: A set of very flexible and slick scales has grown to cover your body.  These act as weak natural armor, improve your ability to swim, and make you difficult to grab.  Mostly reduces wet effects.

name: Chimerical Protection
description: Finally! That weird skin has now developed a cohesive fur-scale skin that was before unseen in the animal kingdom. This provides considerable protection and warmth. Moderately reduces wet effects.

name: Quick Pain Recovery
description: You recover from pain faster than normal.

name: Raptor Muzzle
description: Your face and jaws have extended outwards causing you to resemble an extinct dinosaur. It's filled with razor sharp teeth that leave nasty wounds, but it prevents you from wearing mouthgear.

name: Lupine Muzzle
description: Your jaw and nose have extended into a wolfish muzzle.  It lends itself to biting in combat and looks impressive, but prevents you from wearing mouthgear.

name: Beastly Muzzle
description: Your jaw and nose have extended into some kind of monstrous muzzle. It delivers a strong bite and looks absolutely beastly, but prevents you from wearing mouthgear.

name: Ursine Muzzle
description: Your jaw and nose have extended into a bearish muzzle.  You could bite with it, and it looks impressive, but it prevents you from wearing mouthgear.

name: Ratlike Muzzle
description: Your face and jaw have extended, giving you an alert and attentive appearance.

name: Reptilian Muzzle
description: Your face and jaws have extended outwards causing you to resemble some kind of crocodilian.  They look NASTY - as do the bite wounds they can inflict - but prevent you from wearing mouthgear.

name: Bovine Snout
description: Your face resembles that of a bull, with a significant snout.  It looks fearsome but prevents you from wearing mouthgear.

name: Chimerical Muzzle
description: Your face and jaws have extended outwards into some sort of bizarre muzzle that blends features from various animals. You could not even begin to guess what it could belong to, but you do know that it has one powerful bite.

name: Curled Horns
description: You have a pair of large curled horns, like those of a ram.  They allow you to make a strong bashing headbutt attack, but prevent you from wearing any headwear that is not made of fabric.

name: Mammal Pheromones
description: Your body produces low-level pheromones which puts mammals at ease.  They will be less likely to attack or flee from you.

name: Very Heavy Sleeper
description: You could probably sleep through a firefight.

name: Pointed Horns
description: You have a pair of long, pointed horns, like those of an antelope.  They allow you to make a strong piercing headbutt attack, but prevent you from wearing any headwear that is not made of fabric.

name: Antlers
description: You have a huge rack of antlers, like those of a moose.  They prevent you from hearing headwear that is not made of fabric, but provide a weak headbutt attack.

name: Antennae
description: You have a pair of antennae.  They allow you to detect the presence of monsters up to a few tiles away, even if you can't see or hear them, but prevent you from wearing headwear that is not made of fabric.

name: Horns
description: You have a pair of small horns on your head.  They allow you to make a weak piercing headbutt attack.

name: Head Bumps
description: You have a pair of bumps on your skull.

name: Inconveniently Large
description: You have grown noticeably taller and broader.  Much of it is useful muscle mass (Strength +3), but you find it throws off your balance and you get in your own way (+10 torso and arm encumbrance).

name: Large
description: You carry your rugged body with the dignity you deserve.  Strength +4.

name: Freakishly Huge
description: You have grown even more massive, to the point where you cannot usefully fit into human-sized clothing or vehicles.  Much of it is powerful muscle mass (Strength +6), but it's a real pain to haul around.

name: Huge
description: Your cardiovascular system has caught up with your muscular physique, so who needs pathetic human cars? Strength +8.

name: Strong
description: Your muscles are a little stronger.  Strength + 1

name: Very Strong
description: Your muscles are stronger.  Strength + 2

name: Extremely Strong
description: Your muscles are much stronger.  Strength + 4

name: Insanely Strong
description: Your muscles are noticeably bulging.  Strength + 7

name: Perceptive
description: Your senses are a little keener.  Perception + 1

name: Very Perceptive
description: Your senses are keener.  Perception + 2

name: Very Smart
description: You are smarter.  Intelligence + 2

name: Ratty Smarts
description: You bet that you could solve any maze or problem faster than those other 'survivors'.  Intelligence + 3

name: Extremely Smart
description: You are much smarter, and your skull bulges slightly.  Intelligence + 4

name: Insanely Smart
description: Your skull bulges noticeably with your impressive brain.  Intelligence + 7

name: Very Dextrous
description: You are nimbler.  Dexterity + 2

name: Ratty Finesse
description: Now the cataclysm is here it's better to be quick than slow.  Dexterity + 3

name: Extremely Dextrous
description: You are nimble and quick.  Dexterity + 4

name: Insanely Dextrous
description: You are much nimbler than before.  Dexterity + 7

name: Poor Hearing
description: Your hearing is poor, and you may not hear quiet or far-off noises.

name: No Ears
description: Your outer aural organs have disappeared leaving you without external ears making you look a bit like a bird. This does not effect your hearing in any way.

name: No Ears
description: Your outer aural organs have disappeared leaving you without external ears making you look a bit like a lizard. This does not effect your hearing in any way.

name: No Ears
description: Your outer aural organs have disappeared leaving you without external ears making you look a bit like a raptor. This does not effect your hearing in any way.

name: No Ears
description: Your outer aural organs have disappeared leaving you without external ears making you look a bit like a spider. This does not effect your hearing in any way.

name: No Ears
description: Your outer aural organs have disappeared leaving you without external ears making you look a bit like some sort of insect. This does not effect your hearing in any way.

name: No Ears
description: Your outer aural organs have disappeared leaving you without external ears making you look a bit like some sort of cephalopod. This does not effect your hearing in any way.

name: No Ears
description: Your outer aural organs have disappeared leaving you without external ears making you look a bit like a tortoise. This does not effect your hearing in any way.

name: Fin Ears
description: Your ears have changed into fin-like appendages. This does not effect your hearing in any way but it does look striking. Slightly reduces wet effects

name: Rat Ears
description: Your ears have grown large and round, much like those of a rat.  They don't get in the way of headgear very much, but they don't seem to have made your hearing any better.

name: Canine Ears
description: Your ears have extended into long, pointed ones, like those of a canine.  They enhance your hearing, allowing you to hear at greater distances.

name: Lupine Ears
description: Your hearing has evolved further and is now on par with wolves.  You can hear things significantly farther away.

name: Feline Ears
description: Your ears have extended into long, pointed, velvety ones, like those of a feline.  You find it easier to tune in on sounds from afar.

name: Ursine Ears
description: Your ears have grown longer and rounder, much like those of a bear.  You can hear things a little farther away.

name: Pointed Ears
description: Your upper earlobes have grown noticeably higher.  Fortunately, they don't get in the way of your headgear, much.  Unfortunately, they also don't seem to help your hearing any.

name: No Nose
description: Your entire nose has disappeared leaving nothing behind. This does not seem to effect your sense of smell at all as you have developed other organs for smell, but it does make you look rather inhuman.

name: No Nose
description: Your entire nose has disappeared leaving nothing behind. This does not seem to effect your sense of smell at all as you have developed other organs for smell, but it does make you look rather inhuman.

name: Slit Nostrils
description: You have a flattened nose and thin slits for nostrils, giving you a lizard-like appearance.  This makes breathing slightly difficult and increases mouth encumbrance by 5.

name: Slit Nostrils
description: You have a flattened nose and thin slits for nostrils, giving you a fish-like appearance.  This makes breathing slightly difficult and increases mouth encumbrance by 5.

name: Slit Nostrils
description: You have a flattened nose and thin slits for nostrils, giving you a tortoise-like appearance.  This makes breathing slightly difficult and increases mouth encumbrance by 5.

name: Stinger
description: You have a bulbous bee-like abdomen tipped with a smooth stinger that bobs behind you.  It does not improve your balance at all, but allows for a powerful piercing attack.  Prevents wearing non-fabric pants.

attacks.attack_text_u: You stab at %s with your insectoid stinger
attacks.attack_text_npc: %1$s stabs at %2$s with the insectoid stinger

name: Finned Tail
description: You have a sleek, aquadynamic tail like that of a shark or dolphin. It allows you to swim more quickly, but prevents wearing non-fabric pants.  Slightly increases wet benefits.

name: Long Tail
description: You have a long, graceful tail, like that of a big cat.  It improves your balance, making your ability to dodge higher, but prevents wearing non-fabric pants.

name: Cattle Tail
description: You have a long tail with a tuft on the end.  You find yourself instinctively swatting away flies with it, though it's not as effective at balancing you as you'd like.  Prevents wearing non-fabric pants.

name: Rat Tail
description: You have a long but hairless tail.  It's a pretty effective balancing aid, but does look, uh, ratty.  Prevents wearing non-fabric pants.

name: Thick Tail
description: You have a long, thick, lizardlike tail.  It helps you balance a bit but also makes a serviceable whip.  Prevents wearing non-fabric pants.

name: Raptor Tail
description: You have a long and semi-stiff lizardlike tail.  You can't effectively lash it in combat, but it significantly improves your balance.  Prevents wearing non-fabric pants.

name: Fluffy Tail
description: You have a long, fluffy-furred tail.  It greatly improves your balance, making your ability to dodge much higher.  Prevents wearing non-fabric pants.

name: Fluffy Basher
description: Your fluffy tail has now become pretty long and very strong... Possibly even stronger than a baseball bat when its tensed, allowing for a mighty swing attack. Great! you won't be needing a baseball bat anymore if you want to play baseball and the funny part is that all the hits will be homerun! It also has become a bit more controllable and prehensile.

attacks.attack_text_u: You strongly swing at %s with your mighty tail
attacks.attack_text_npc: %1$s strongly swings at %2$s with its mighty tail

name: Club Tail
description: You have a long tail that ends in a heavy, bony club.  It does not improve your balance at all, but allows for a powerful bashing attack.  Prevents wearing non-fabric pants.

name: Mutated Raptor Tail
description: Your long semi-stiff lizard-like tail has mutated and now its slightly longer and ends in a viciously sharp and boney point.  It does not improve your balance at all, but allows you to lash with it and cause significant piercing damage.  Prevents wearing non-fabric pants. Now that is a heavy genetic modification.

name: Venomous
description: Your body produces a potent venom.  Cutting or stabbing attacks from mutations have a chance to poison your target.

name: Razor Teeth
description: You have grown multiple rows of razor sharp teeth. They allow you to make a super powerful bite attack, but they have caused your mouth and jaw to widen significantly making you look like a shark or angler-fish

name: Woodpecker Beak
description: Pecking at prey is part of your daily routine now.  Slightly reduces wet effects.

name: Hummingbird Beak
description: Though your beak's not suitable for pecking, those flowers out there are a good source of energy.  Examine them to feed.

name: Proboscis
description: You've gotten rid of that terribly imprecise mouth and now imbibe your food like a proper person.  Chewing was tiresome anyway.

name: Mouth Tentacles
description: A set of tentacles surrounds your mouth.  They allow you to eat twice as fast.  Slightly decreases wet penalties.

name: Mandibles
description: A set of insect-like mandibles have grown around your mouth.  They allow you to eat faster and provide a slicing unarmed attack, but prevent you from wearing mouthwear.  Slightly reduces wet effects.

name: Spider Fangs
description: Your mandibles have developed extensible fangs, allowing you to bite quickly or ensure your venom goes home, as desired.  Activate to extend or retract your fangs.

name: Optimist
description: Nothing gets you down!  You savor the joys of life, ignore its hardships, and are generally happier than most people.

name: Light Eater
description: Your metabolism is a little slower, and you require less food than most.

name: Accomplished Sleeper
description: You have always been able to fall asleep easily, even when sleeping in less than ideal circumstances.

name: Tough
description: It takes a lot to bring you down!  You get a 20% bonus to all hit points.

name: Durable
description: You can shrug off almost anything!  You get a 30% bonus to all hit points.

name: Unbreakable
description: Nothing can break you!  You get a 40% bonus to all hit points.

name: Thick-Skinned
description: Your skin is tough. Damage is slightly reduced for you.  Slightly decreases wet penalties.

name: Animal Empathy
description: Peaceful animals will not run away from you, and even aggressive animals are less likely to attack.  This only applies to natural animals such as woodland creatures.

name: Clumsy
description: You make more noise while walking.  You're also more likely to set off traps.

name: Inconspicuous
description: While sleeping or staying still, it is less likely that monsters will wander close to you.

name: Languorous
description: Whether due to lack of exercise and poor diet, or due to a natural disinclination to physical endurance, you tire due to physical exertion much more readily than others.  Your maximum stamina is 25% lower than usual.

name: Sleepy
description: You need sleep more often, but still spend most of your time awake.

name: Slow Learner
description: You are slow to grasp new ideas and thus learn things more slowly than others.  Note that this only applies to real-world experience, not to skill gain from other sources like books.

name: Slow Footed
description: You can't move as fast as most, resulting in a 15% speed penalty on flat ground.

name: Reptilian Healing
description: Your broken limbs mend themselves without significant difficulty.

name: Webbed Extremities
description: Your hands and feet are strongly webbed allowing you to swim much faster. Unfortunately, gloves now give you problems and your dexterity is decreased by 1. Slightly decreases wet penalties.

name: Toe Roots
description: Your toes have grown wriggly, and you can't imagine why you wear that stuff on your feet.  Take it off.  It's in the way.

name: Leg Tentacles
description: Your legs have transformed into six tentacles.  This decreases your speed on land by 20%, makes your movement silent, increases your swimming speed, and reduces wet penalties.

name: Thick Scales
description: A set of heavy green scales has grown to cover your body, acting as natural armor. While difficult to penetrate, it also limits your flexibility, resulting in a -2 penalty to Dexterity.  Greatly reduces wet effects.

name: Bony Scutes
description: A set of sub-dermal bony scutes has grown all over your body, giving you something similar to an insect's exoskeleton. they give your scales a rough and pebbly texture and are nigh impossible to penetrate. reduces wet effects.

name: Tortoise Scales
description: A set of heavy, stiff, and thick scales has grown to cover your body, acting as natural armor.  While very protective, it also severely limits your flexibility, resulting in a -3 penalty to Dexterity.  Greatly reduces wet effects.

name: Ruminant
description: Your digestive system is capable of digesting cellulose and other rough plant material.  You can eat underbrush by activating this, standing over your target, and pressing E.

name: Grazer
description: You're accustomed to eating plants directly, and can get nutrition from grass as well as underbrush.  Eat either one by activating this,  standing over your target, and pressing E.

name: Resilient
description: You can survive injuries that would incapacitate humans: you get a 20% bonus to all hit points.  Stacks with Tough, etc.

name: Solidly Built
description: Not much scares you.  You get a 30% bonus to all hit points.  Stacks with Tough, etc.

name: TAAANK
description: You can simply take the punishment from lesser beings and keep going.  You get a 40% bonus to all hit points.  Stacks with Tough, etc.

name: Snout
description: Your face and jaw have begun...changing.  Masks and such fit OK, but you're noticeably mutated.

name: Snapping Muzzle
description: Your face and jaws have morphed to look like those found on a snapping turtle. It gives you a turtle-like look and they deliver a painful bite, but prevent you from wearing mouthgear not made of fabric.

name: Herbivore
description: Your body's ability to digest meat is severely hampered.  Eating meat has a good chance of making you vomit it back up; even if you manage to keep it down, its nutritional value is greatly reduced.

name: Ponderous
description: Your muscles are generally slow to move.  You move 10% slower.

name: Very Ponderous
description: Your muscles are quite slow to move.  You move 20% slower.

name: Extremely Ponderous
description: Your muscles are very slow to move.  You move 30% slower.

name: Shell
description: You have grown a thick shell over your torso, providing excellent armor.  You find you can use the empty space as 16 storage space, but cannot wear anything on your torso.  Somewhat reduces wet effects.

name: Roomy Shell
description: Your protective shell has grown large enough to accommodate--if need be--your whole body.  Activate to pull your head and limbs into your shell, trading mobility and vision for warmth and shelter.

name: Fat Deposits
description: You've put on some additional weight around your body.  It slows you down a little, but helps your swimming and warmth.

name: Hibernation
description: You've developed the ability to stockpile calories and then sleep for extended periods of time.

name: Tortoise
description: Now that you have your shell you can take your time with this survival business.

name: Saprovore
description: Your digestive system is specialized to allow you to consume decaying material.  You can eat rotten food, albeit for less nutrition than usual.

name: Carnivore
description: Your body's ability to digest fruits, vegetables and grains is severely hampered.  You cannot eat anything besides meat.

name: Paws
description: Your hands have fused into quasi-paws.  Fine manipulation is a challenge: permanent hand encumbrance of 10, difficulty with delicate craftwork, and your gloves don't fit.  But they handle water better.

name: Feathered Arms
description: Your arms have grown vibrantly colored feathers.  They effectively waterproof your arms and take the edge off hits, but they get slightly in the way.  They're simply too small to help you in the air.

name: Deformed
description: You're minorly deformed.  Some people will react badly to your appearance.

name: Bovine Eyes
description: Your eyes have mutated, now having a long and narrow horizontal pupil much like those of a bovine.  This is visually striking, but it doesn't seem to effect your vision at all.

name: Arachnid Eyes
description: You have grown 4 additional eyes and all of your eyes have become solid pitch black. This increases your perception by 2 and makes you look more spider-like.

name: Reptilian Eyes
description: Your eyes have mutated, with a brilliant iris and slitted pupil similar to that of a lizard. This is visually striking, but doesn't seem to affect your vision.

name: Tortoise Eyes
description: Your eyes have mutated to resemble those found on a tortoise. This is visually striking, but doesn't seem to affect your vision.

name: Feline Eyes
description: Your eyes have mutated, now having a slitted pupil and glittering in light, much like those of cats. This is visually striking, but it isn't helping you see at night.

name: Ursine Vision
description: Your visual processing has shifted: though you can see better in the dark, you're nearsighted in the light. Maybe glasses would help.  Activate to toggle NV-visible areas on or off.

name: Avian Eyes
description: Your vision has become particularly acute: you suspect you could pick out zombies much farther away. Perception +4.

name: Fey Eyes
description: Your eyes have turned...green.  It's tough to tell the exact shade as it seems to shift.  The effect is ...pleasant.

name: Cephalopod Eyes
description: Your eyes still bulge, but your pupils have flattened and elongated horizontally and now flare out towards the ends. Water doesn't seem to cause any trouble at all, though.

name: Fishy Eyes
description: Your eyes are now a solid black with no visible iris and barely noticeable sclera. They give you a vaguely fish-like look but they otherwise serve no purpose.

name: Bulging Eyes
description: Your eyes bulge out several inches from your skull.  This does not affect your vision in any way.

name: Nictitating Membrane
description: You have a second set of clear eyelids which lower while underwater, allowing you to see as though you were wearing goggles.  Slightly decreases wet penalties.

name: Fangs
description: Your teeth have grown into two-inch-long fangs, allowing you to make an extra attack when conditions favor it.

name: Sabre Teeth
description: Your fangs have grown extremely large and incredibly sharp.  They make it impossible to wear mouthgear and make it difficult to eat, but they leave nasty wounds when you bite.

name: Indefatigable
description: Whether due to exercise and good diet, or due to a natural propensity to physical endurance, you tire due to physical exertion much less readily than others.  Your maximum stamina is 25% higher than usual.

name: Terrifying
description: There's something about you that creatures find frightening, and they are more likely to try to flee.
